headline: TMUS Introduces Direct-to-Cell Services With Starlink: Stock to Gain?
summary: T-Mobile is set to introduce a beta program in collaboration with Starlink, offering direct-to-cell satellite services. The initiative aims at expanding coverage in remote regions.

raw.headline: TMUS Introduces Direct-to-Cell Services With Starlink: Stock to Gain?

headline: What’s Behind Masayoshi Son’s $100 Billion Pledge to Donald Trump
summary: To meet the commitment, the CEO of SoftBank Group will need to embark on a combination of a massive fundraising effort, a huge amount of new debt or selling chunks of the company’s holdings to raise cash.

raw.headline: What’s Behind Masayoshi Son’s $100 Billion Pledge to Donald Trump
raw.summary: To meet the commitment, the CEO of SoftBank Group will need to embark on a combination of a massive fundraising effort, a huge amount of new debt or selling chunks of the company’s holdings to raise cash.

headline: Verizon: Lot Of Pitfalls Ahead
summary: Verizon has shown 20% YTD total returns, compared to 28% total returns by the broader S&P 500 and 50% by AT&T. Read why I remain bearish on VZ stock.
